page.title: 02Combwich on the Parrett.
page.content: Combwich is a village on the banks of the{River Parrett,}a tidal river.There are{208} houses in which live{696}people.{339}men, {357}women,{ {85}boys and {95}girls. There are {34} families without cars{139}1 car{67}2 car and {10}3 car families.There is a {Brush Factory}and{2 Public Houses}. There is a{Post Office}in Combwich which can give you lots of information .There were{two}shops one is a small general purpose shop.The other has recently closed down.Most houses over look the{River}and a few gardens have swimming pools.The village is quiet and peaceful just the place for someone to retire.Yet there are young people moving to the village and the numbers are increasing. There's a {school,a chapel,a church and a village {hall which is used for clinic ,jumble {sales,bingo,flower shows and judo.}
